    RESERVATION_FULL - Enum constant in enum class common.ServiceResponse.ServiceStatus
    Case: No availability found for requested or alternative slots.
    RESERVATION_OUT_OF_HOURS - Enum constant in enum class common.ServiceResponse.ServiceStatus
    Case: The requested time falls outside of restaurant operating hours.
    RESERVATION_SUCCESS - Enum constant in enum class common.ServiceResponse.ServiceStatus
    Case: The reservation was successfully placed and saved in the DB.
    RESERVATION_SUGGESTION - Enum constant in enum class common.ServiceResponse.ServiceStatus
    Case: Slot is full, but an alternative date/time is suggested.
